entries.journal_entry_description: Chatook asked you to help him find his missing son. The last time that he saw his son was a few days ago when Takook, along with his friend Lobarorr, went hunting. Chatook is extremely worried that his son might have been attacked by one of the many dangerous creatures on Kashyyyk.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Chatook has asked you to help find his missing son, Takook. The last time that he saw his son, Takook was heading off to do a little hunting with his friend, Lobarorr.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Takook lies dead. Mortally wounded by his once friend Lobarorr, who struck down Takook to steal a spear belonging to Takook's father. With his last words, Takook begged you to recover his father's spear from Lobarorr. His recording spoke of a hiding spot that Lobarorr claimed to have on the Rryatt trail. It may be a good place to start searching.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Now that you have recovered the spear from the wicked Lobarorr, you must tell the sad news about the loss of his son to Chatook. His son's dying wish was to make sure that Chatook's spear was returned to him.
